GSNE8P
Sonic Adventure 2: Battle

80AB0000 900A0000

4E800020 9421FF80
BC410008 9421FFF0
7C0802A6 3880000C
93E1000C 3FE08001
3BFF036C 90010014
7FE3FB78 4BFFFE49
7FE3FB78 3880000C
4BFFFD65 60000000
80010014 83E1000C
38210010 7C0803A6
B8410008 38210080
4E800020 4E800020
GeckoTunnel script: record and play ghosts/replays or play over LAN or online. Requires GOSM handler (found in GeckoOS Mod; deprecated in favor of 1931 handler). See http://veclabs.posterous.com/pages/geckotunnel for instructions.

GeckoTunnel script: record and play ghosts/replays or play over LAN or online. Requires 1931 handler (found in recent NeoGamma). See http://veclabs.posterous.com/pages/geckotunnel for instructions.

Chao Growth Modifier [goemon_guy]
48000000 803AD80C
DE000000 80008180
140049B4 XXXXXXXX
E0000000 80008000
Change XXXX to a floating value above 3F800000 for wacky results.

Chao Type Modifier [goemon_guy]
48000000 803AD80C
DE000000 80008180
10004964 000000XX
E2000001 80008000
Replace XX with one of the following
01 - Egg
02 - Neutral Baby
03 - Hero Baby
04 - Dark Baby
05 - Neutral/None
06 - Hero/None
07 - Dark/None
08 - Neutral/Swim
09 - Hero/Swim
0A - Dark/Swim
0B - Neutral/Fly
0C - Hero/Fly
0D - Dark/Fly
0E - Neutral/Run
0F - Hero/Run
10 - Dark/Run
11 - Neutral/Power
12 - Hero/Power
13 - Dark/Power
14 - Neutral Chaos
15 - Angel Chaos
16 - Devil Chaos
17 - Tails Chao
18 - Knuckles Chao
19 - Amy Chao

Always Play As Mechless Tails [Link Master]
0401EC8C 60000000
003AD82B 00000002
Co-authors: Link & Sappharad

Always Play As Mechless Eggman [Link Master]
0401EC64 60000000
003AD82B 00000003
Co-authors: Link & Sappharad

Mechless Tails & Eggman [Link Master]
0401EC64 60000000
0401EC8C 60000000
Co-author: Link

Press Z For 1 of Each Legendary Type Animal [Link Master]
28357F60 00000010
081E4C0B 00000012

Press Z For 1 of Each Chaos Drive [Link Master]
28357F60 00000010
081E4C0B 00000015
00040008 00000001
001E4C5B 00000004
081E4CBF 00000015
00040008 00000001
001E4D0F 00000004
E0000000 80008000

Use only one at a time. Any slot modified by these codes cannot
contain any other animal or chaos drive while the code is in use.
Holding down Z after entering a Chao Garden will cause it to drop
an infinite ammount of the animal or chaos drive in slot 1.
Pressing Z while it's dropping them will cause it to restart and
drop them all again. Don't drop too many animals and/or chaos
drives or it will cause the game to lag horribly.

Animal & Chaos Drive Modifier (Press Z) (Hero Story Characters) [Link Master]
28357F60 00000010
001E4C0B 000000XX
001E4C13 000000XX
001E4C1B 000000XX
001E4C23 000000XX
001E4C2B 000000XX
001E4C33 000000XX
001E4C3B 000000XX
001E4C43 000000XX
001E4C4B 000000XX
001E4C53 000000XX
001E4C5B 000000YY
E0000000 80008000

Animal & Chaos Drive Modifier (Press Z) (Dark Story Characters) [Link Master]
28357F60 00000010
001E4CBF 000000XX
001E4CC7 000000XX
001E4CCF 000000XX
001E4CD7 000000XX
001E4CDF 000000XX
001E4CE7 000000XX
001E4CEF 000000XX
001E4CF7 000000XX
001E4CFF 000000XX
001E4D07 000000XX
001E4D0F 000000YY
E0000000 80008000

XX is the Animal/Chaos Drive you have in each slot. YY is the
number of Animals/Chaos Drives you have. Set YY between 01 and 0A
(10 in hex). If you exceed 0A (10) the code will crash the game
when used. If you set it to 00, the code will give you 0
Animals/Chaos Drives (making it pretty useless). Set it to the
ammount of Animals/Chaos Drives you want. If you want less than
10, delete the extra lines from the code.
XX - Values
00 - Penguin
01 - Seal
02 - Sea Otter
03 - Rabbit
04 - Cheetah
05 - Hedgehog
06 - Bear
07 - Tiger
08 - Gorilla
09 - Peacock
0A - Parrot
0B - Condor
0C - Skunk
0D - Ram
0E - Raccoon
0F - Half Fish (Sea Creature)
10 - Skeleton Dog
11 - Bat
12 - Dragon
13 - Unicorn
14 - Pheonix
15 - Yellow Chaos Drive
16 - Green Chaos Drive
17 - Red Chaos Drive
18 - Purple Chaos Drive

04 - Dark Baby [goemon_guy]
00000000 00000000
